nodes.text: Starlight Three was the callsign assigned to the third pilot of the Rebel Alliance's Starlight Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, L'ulo L'ampar used this callsign during Operation Starlight where he flew a RZ-1 A-wing interceptor against Imperial forces.

Starlight Three appeared in Star Wars 10, a comic written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Jan Bazaldua, and published by Marvel Comics on January 6, 2021. The callsign was used by L'ulo L'ampar, however he later used a different callsign, Starlight Two, in Star Wars 11 published on February 3, 2021.
